site.title: Parivartan | Niranjan Kulkarni
site.description: Soft Skills Trainer, Event Anchor, Theatre Artist & Public Speaker transforming lives through expression

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I Am
about.intro: I am a passionate Soft Skills Trainer, Professional Anchor, Theatre Artist, and Public Speaker, dedicated to helping people communicate with confidence and perform at their best—on stage, at work, and in life.
about.approach_text: I strongly believe that learning should be simple and practical, communication should be clear and confident, and every individual has untapped potential.
about.mission_text: To empower individuals and teams with effective communication skills, confident body language, and the mindset required to succeed in professional and personal life.
about.brand_story1: "Parivartan" means Transformation in Hindi and Marathi. This name embodies my core belief - that every individual has the potential to transform themselves through better communication, confidence, and expression.
about.brand_story2: My journey from corporate employee to theatre artist to professional trainer has taught me that transformation is not just possible, it's inevitable when you combine passion with purpose.

skills.corporate_items: Soft Skills Training, Leadership Development, POSH Training, SQDCM Techniques
skills.performance_items: Stage Acting, Voice Modulation, Event Anchoring, Public Speaking

2008.title: Journey Begins
2008.description: Started career in Publishing industry, discovering passion for communication and expression.

2012.title: Theatre Debut
2012.description: Entered the world of Marathi theatre, combining professional work with artistic passion.

2015.title: Commercial Theater & Anchoring
2015.description: Started working commercially as a Theater Artist and Anchor, turning passion into profession.

2017.title: Corporate Training
2017.description: Transitioned to Manufacturing sector, began conducting soft skills training programs.

2020.title: Parivartan Founded
2020.description: Founded Parivartan with a short film and podcast, combining theatre, training, and anchoring under one brand.

2023.title: Business Podcast
2023.description: Started business podcast to help entrepreneurs share their stories and grow their brands.

2024.title: Corporate Training & Public Speaking
2024.description: Expanded into corporate training and started working as a professional Public Speaker.

about.cta_text: Let's discuss how we can work together to achieve your training and event goals.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Training & Performance Solutions
services.catalog_desc: 12-month comprehensive training programs tailored for corporates, manufacturing, and institutions.

descriptions.personality: Unlock your true potential with confidence-building techniques, self-awareness exercises, and personal branding strategies.
descriptions.etiquette: Master professional etiquette, workplace manners, and personal grooming for corporate success.
descriptions.teamwork: Build stronger teams through collaboration exercises, trust-building activities, and effective communication.
descriptions.conflict: Learn to handle workplace conflicts professionally with mediation techniques and constructive dialogue.
descriptions.leadership: Develop leadership qualities that inspire teams and drive organizational success.
descriptions.speaking: Master the art of public speaking with voice modulation, stage presence, and audience engagement techniques.
descriptions.time: Optimize productivity with goal-setting frameworks, prioritization techniques, and time management strategies.
descriptions.sqdcm: Implement SQDCM (Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, Morale) techniques for manufacturing excellence.
descriptions.marketing: Learn fundamental marketing and sales techniques to grow business and build customer relationships.
descriptions.posh: Comprehensive POSH (Prevention of Sexual Harassment) awareness and compliance training.
descriptions.storytelling: Harness the power of storytelling for business communication and motivational speaking.
descriptions.anchoring: Professional event hosting for corporate, cultural, musical, and social events.

features.personality: Self-confidence building, Body language mastery, Personal branding, First impression management
features.etiquette: Business etiquette, Dress code guidance, Email & phone etiquette, Meeting protocols
features.teamwork: Team building activities, Collaboration techniques, Trust exercises, Group dynamics
features.conflict: Conflict resolution, Mediation skills, Active listening, Win-win negotiation
features.leadership: Leadership styles, Decision making, Team motivation, Strategic thinking
features.speaking: Voice modulation, Stage presence, Audience engagement, Overcoming fear
features.time: Goal setting (SMART), Prioritization matrix, Productivity hacks, Work-life balance
features.sqdcm: Safety protocols, Quality management, Delivery optimization, Cost reduction
features.marketing: Sales fundamentals, Customer relations, Pitch presentation, Negotiation skills
features.posh: Legal awareness, Workplace safety, Reporting mechanisms, Case studies
features.storytelling: Narrative techniques, Emotional connection, Business storytelling, Motivational talks
features.anchoring: Corporate events, Musical evenings, Social gatherings, Cultural programs

services.anchoring_desc: With 10+ years of stage experience, I bring energy, professionalism, and perfect coordination to every event. Whether corporate, cultural, musical, or social - your event deserves an exceptional host.
services.whatsapp_anchor_msg: Hi Niranjan, I need an event anchor.
services.languages_desc: All programs available in three languages for maximum reach and impact.
services.cta_text: Let's discuss your specific requirements and create a tailored solution for your organization.

awards.title: Awards & Recognition
awards.subtitle: Celebrating Excellence in Performance

descriptions.debut: Recognized for outstanding first performance in musical theatre.
descriptions.actor1: Awarded for exceptional acting in one-act play competition.
descriptions.actor2: Honored for best theatrical reading performance.
descriptions.poet: Recognized for poetry excellence in corporate competition.
descriptions.anchor: Awarded for professional event hosting excellence.

awards.rangbhumi_desc: Honored by the prestigious Marathi theatre community for contributions to the art form.
awards.theatre_excellence_desc: Recognized for exceptional contribution to Marathi theatre and performing arts. The award celebrates dedication to preserving and promoting the rich theatrical heritage of Maharashtra.
awards.cta_text: Bring excellence and experience to your next event or training program.

podcast.title: Business Podcast
podcast.subtitle: Stories That Inspire & Brands That Grow
podcast.description: A powerful platform where entrepreneurs share their journey, struggles, success stories, and vision—while promoting their products and services.
podcast.what_offers_desc: A platform designed to amplify your story and grow your brand.
podcast.feature1_points: The idea & inspiration, Challenges & turning points, Growth journey & lessons learned, Vision for the future
podcast.feature2_points: Showcase products & services, Highlight unique value proposition, Build trust and credibility, Strengthen personal brand
podcast.who_for_desc: Perfect platform for business leaders ready to share their journey.
podcast.host_advantage_text: My experience as a public speaker, anchor, and theatre artist ensures every conversation is comfortable, expressive, and impactful.
podcast.whatsapp_msg: Hi Niranjan, I am interested in being a guest on your podcast.
podcast.whatsapp_apply_msg: Hi Niranjan, I want to be a guest on your Business Podcast.
podcast.cta_text: Let's create a powerful episode that showcases your journey and grows your brand.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's Create Something Amazing Together
contact.quick_response_text: For urgent inquiries, WhatsApp is the fastest way to reach me. I'm available for discussions regarding training programs, event anchoring, and podcast collaborations.
